The version of Google Play Services you have installed is not functioning correctly. Please reinstall Google Play Services and try again.
TextSecure is a messaging app that allows you to take back your privacy while easily communicating with friends.

Using TextSecure, you can communicate instantly while avoiding SMS fees, create groups so that you can chat in real time with all your friends at once, and share media or attachments all with complete privacy. The server never has access to any of your communication and never stores any of your data.
* Private. TextSecure uses an advanced end to end encryption protocol that provides privacy for every message every time.

* Open Source. TextSecure is Free and Open Source, enabling anyone to verify its security by auditing the code. TextSecure is the only private messenger that uses open source peer-reviewed cryptographic protocols to keep your messages safe.

* Group Chat. TextSecure allows you to create encrypted groups so you can have private conversations with all your friends at once. Not only are the messages encrypted, but the TextSecure server never has access to any group metadata such as the membership list, group title, or group icon.
* Fast. The TextSecure protocol is designed to operate in the most constrained environment possible. Using TextSecure, messages are instantly delivered to friends.
Please file any bugs, issues, or feature requests at:

This device is missing Google Play Services. You can still use Signal, but this configuration may result in reduced reliability or performance.\n\nIf you are not an advanced user, are not running an aftermarket Android ROM, or believe that you are seeing this in error, please contact support@whispersystems.org for help trouble shooting.
This phone number has Registration Lock enabled. Please enter the Registration Lock PIN.
To easily verify your phone number, Signal can automatically detect your verification code if you allow Signal to view SMS messages.

You must specify your phone number
Registration Lock helps protect your phone number from unauthorized registration attempts. This feature can be disabled at any time in your Signal privacy settings
Registration Lock is enabled for your phone number. To help you memorize your Registration Lock PIN, Signal will periodically ask you to confirm it.
The Registration Lock PIN must be at least 4 digits.
The two PINs you entered do not match.

Blocked contacts will no longer be able to send you messages or call you.

Auto-select APNs has failed, try picking your carrier from the preset list instead in MMS settings

Multiple different APNs were found for your carrier, which will be listed after clicking the message below. If one of the following doesn't work for you, try another and one of them should work correctly!

Remember you can always get to this APN selection by going into Settings, going to the MMS Settings page, and then selecting the "Automatically Select APNs" option.

You also have the option under MMS settings to select from a list of preset APNs that could work instead of these that have been automatically found.

Signal requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, tap \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
Please enter your mobile number to receive a verification code. Carrier rates may apply.

Signal makes it easy to communicate by using your existing phone number and address book. Friends and contacts who already know how to contact you by phone will be able to easily get in touch by Signal.\n\nRegistration transmits some contact information to the server. It is not stored.
The Registration Lock PIN is not the same as the SMS verification code you just received. Please enter the PIN you previously configured in the application.
The PIN can consist of four or more digits. If you forget your PIN, you could be locked out of your account for up to seven days.
Your version of Signal has expired!
Messages will no longer send successfully. Tap to update to the most recent version.
Take your conversation with %1$s to the next level.
Your version of Signal is outdated
Your version of Signal will expire today. Tap to update to the most recent version.
The more friends use Signal, the better it gets.
Tap to make Signal your default SMS app.
Tap to copy your phone\'s SMS messages into Signal\'s encrypted database.

DON\'T ADD, BUT MAKE MY PROFILE VISIBLE
The sender is not in your contact list

If you wish to verify the security of your encryption with %s, compare the number above with the number on their device. Alternatively, you can scan the code on their phone, or ask them to scan your code. Learn more.

Starting with Android Marshmallow, multimedia messaging applications can no longer directly request to send messages over your mobile data, which is a requirement for sending things like pictures.\n\nTo be able to send messages, the app will need the write settings permission, which must be explicitly granted. Without this, multimedia messages will fail to send.
